channel.title: Barrow brothers drops
channel.description:
Hay,
So i never realy botherd doing drops for my server, but now i want to give it a try, I want to add it so that each barrow brother drops there own armor 1 pice at a time in random order
could sum 1 show me how to make drops to give me the barrow brothers drops plz
